'''The Final Fonta Sea''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. The achievements are earned by using the [[Full Pankration Fonta Cup]].

==Trivia==
* This achievement's name is a pun on the name of the ''{{w|Final Fantasy}}'' video game franchise.
** The second tier's specific requirement of 13 uses likely alludes to {{W|Final Fantasy XIII}} being the first mainline installment to receive an official release in Chinese.
** The last tier's specific requirement of 16 uses likely alludes to the franchise having 16 mainline installments at the time of release.
